newsitem.title: UK: Bomb alert outside top N.Ireland prison.
newsitem.headline: Bomb alert outside top N.Ireland prison.

text.p: A lorry was abandoned outside the main gate of Northern Ireland's top-security Maze prison on Saturday, prompting a major security alert.
"The area has been sealed off and army experts are examining the vehicle," a police spokesman said. "There is no immediate danger," he added.

Houses around the prison have been evacuated as a precaution but the prisoners -- the jail contains Northern Ireland's leading convicted gunmen and bombers from both sides of the sectarian divide -- have not been moved.
